page.title: 17I love living in Uyeasound.
page.content: I was born in Lerwick on Thursday 15th May 1975 but since then I have lived in Uyeasound. I love living in Uyeasound because the people I know are very nice. I love all the birds in Uyeasound because they are very beautiful. The school that I go to is brilliant but some of the of the teachers are strict. In Uyeasound there is lots of open space because there are hardly any houses. I love it in Uyeasound because in Summer the nights are light and you can stay out late. I would like Uyeasound to have a roundabout in the playpark like the one at Haroldswick. If I had to live anywhere else I would choose Baltasound.
